data.title: The Trevor Goddard Story by Graham Short: Good Hardcover (1965) 1st Edition
data.meta_description: 1st Edition - Hardcover - Purfleet Productions, Durban - 1965 - Condition: Good - Poor - 215 pages, very well illustrated, with Forewords by Don Bradman and Ken Barrington. A fine biography of this excellent all-round cricketer who, as a player and a man, was held in extremely high esteem. Book: is bumped around spine, some light marks, but generally close to very good. Jacket: worn around all edges; large tear at rear cover crease with spine, which has been repaired by sellotape; corner wear and creases; though front cover photograph is reasonably preserved. - The Trevor Goddard Story
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Carvid Books is the trading name of David Kelly. My address and telephone number are given on this storefront [see above left]. Email: carvidbooks@yahoo.com.

All books and other items are described as fully and accurately as possible but, if there is any issue when a book or other item is received, please contact me by email or telephone. In addition to debit/credit cards through the AbeBooks system, I accept personal cheque drawn on a UK bank, bank transfer, or cash if you might be located clos...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within two business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. Unless indicated otherwise, shipping to a UK address is included in the indicated shipping price, regardless of the weight, though please refer to the relevant individual listings in case of any exceptions. For orders from outside UK, if the required book weighs in excess of 1kg when packed, I may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
